homepage.statement: With the stress of reality pounding down, all I want is to join characters on their adventures from blooming summer fields to breathtaking untouched tundras. Bring back the whimsy in the mundane and romanticize every aspect of life. After all, just because we are used to it doesn't mean it's not magical still.

aboutPage.aboutStatement:
A writer, a dreamer, and a kid who never grew up.
I've been writing since I was barely old enough to understand that bedtime stories aren't real. I began my publishing career in fanfiction. Would you believe me if I told you the first writing that anyone saw of me was a "Detective Conan" fanfic with an inserted Mary Sue character? Alas, my dark history remains out there.
When I joined the workforce with a career path I like but not love, capitalism kicked my behind. Now I'm writing both for passion and profit.
Programming is my wife but writing is my mistress. Today, we are living in a harmonious polycule.
